r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Use namespaces [moacir] - Use PEAR classname conventions [cweiske] - Add support for dbhtml Process Instructions (PI) [moacir] - Add the --package option [moacir] - Add the Generic Package [moacir] - Add the phpdotnet/phd namespace [cweiske] - Kill themes and add a concept of "packages" [moacir] - Rewrite indexer [bjori, loudi, moacir] - Rewrite program flow [bjori]
